settings.title: Apartments with soul & a special touch.

settings.editor: Comfort, serenity and natural environment are perfectly combined here, because we care about your well-being.

All that matters to us, is that our guests feel comfortable in our bar. We want them to enjoy their drinks and their conversations, and are happy to invite everybody to relax in our comfy lounge sofas and to end the evening with a special signature drinks.
We have one of the best bars in town. And although we are flattered to hear that, we think that every guest has to form their own opinion.
We believe in functioning in harmony with nature. When that's achieved, everything comes to its place - this is the least you'll experience by staying here.
Everything needed for creating special and unique experience is available here. Accept peace of mind and body rejuvenation  directly from nature.
One of the basic philosophy for any kind of holiday and pleasure is quality - every thing must be set for your comfort, satisfaction and memorable experience

You won't need to do anything - just book a room or a suite, pick a location where would you'll like to go, and when, and we will organize everything - including the equipment and staff - scuba gears, sea hunting trainer, safety jackets ... you name it ...
Get 20% off when you book from Tues -  Thurs
Explore hidden and untouched natural beauties on our island.
Fresh food for your meal, picked by you, cooked by our chefs.

While busy working to ensure everything is working, David still somehow finds time to enjoy the beauty of nature, admiring the colors, scents, textures and everything about the materials he get hands on.

Stephanie's holistic approach is something that gives our hotel that little "something" which can't be explained but can be felt. The quality, mood and the comfort are the main guidelines in her work.
We are so very reachable, both as a person and as location (virtual or non-virtual). Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and other social networks, or just pop up, if you happen to be near by ...
